title: Concerned land owner / developer / society / company shall not be allowed to operate the public parking lot
clause_text: Concerned land owner / developer / society / company shall not be allowed to operate the public parking lot. Area covered under parking shall not be counted towards FSI consumption.
section: a) Development of Multi Storey Public Parking Lot (PPL) near Metro Stations

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Concerned land owner / developer / society / company shall not be allowed to operate the public parking lot.
